attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Everywhere you look you so them, teenagers with nothing better to do then get drunk, cause trouble and become a general menace to society.

Before you mock this petition consider this (for all parents) could you cope with your 12 year old becoming pregnant?

For all citizens could you cope being attacked and stabbed by a gang of these youths just because they felt like doing it?

To all the women, could you face the prospect of walking home and being raped, abused?

To all the men, could you face the prospect of knowing that if you stand up for yourself agains them that the law will not favour you?

To the elderly, do you want Britain to be safe again? And to be able to walk the streets without fear?

To all people of all races in the UK are you sick of being vandalised and racially abused by these people?

Sign it.

reasons: Language which is offensive, intemperate, or provocative
